plot: With pluck, talent, and a video blog, Marina, a 40-something actress who hasn't quite made it, is heading for mid-life success. Or crisis.
plot_en: With pluck, talent, and a video blog, Marina, a 40-something actress who hasn't quite made it, is heading for mid-life success. Or crisis.

title: Middle Stage
